attributes.action: Force Pepsi Co. UK to bring Mountain Dew back.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are fed up of paying extortionate prices importing the worlds best Soda.

We need Pepsi Co. to start selling Mountain Dew in the UK.

Even if it's a private deal with a wholesaler, we need to get it without having to import.

Dew for the win!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
